zetachain.title: What is ZetaChain?
zetachain.description: ZetaChain enables seamless interoperability for universal apps, simplifying cross-chain interactions with powerful tools like chain orchestration and native token transfers.

build.title: Why Build on ZetaChain?
build.description: ZetaChain empowers developers to build universal apps with omnichain interoperability, offering seamless cross-chain interactions, native token transfers, forward compatibility, and a gasless execution environment.

evm.title: Universal EVM
evm.description: The Universal EVM on ZetaChain is a decentralized smart contract platform that unifies cross-chain interactions, allowing developers to build omnichain-compatible applications with EVM functionality.

app.title: Universal App
app.description: Universal apps are smart contracts that seamlessly interact with multiple blockchains, enabling cross-chain calls, token transfers, and gas abstraction, supporting EVM, Bitcoin, and other connected networks.
